mapper.select:
SELECT p.`id` AS 'pid',p.`partType` AS 'partTypeName',p.`partClassId`,f.`id` AS 'fid',f.`productName`,f.`productType`,s.*,a1.`id` AS 'a1id',a1.`name` AS 'a1Name',a2.`id` AS 'a2id',a2.`name` AS 'a2Name',d.`id` AS 'did',d.`deptName`,s2.`id` AS 'sid',s2.`finishedProductId`,s2.`goodsOnHand`,s2.`num`,s2.`outInRecordId`,s2.`partTypeId`,d2.`id` AS 'd2id',d2.`deptName` AS 'd2name',a3.`id` AS 'a3id',a3.`name` AS 'a3name' FROM storeHouseOutInRecord s LEFT JOIN admin a1 ON a1.`id` = s.`principal` LEFT JOIN admin a2 ON a2.`id` = s.`receivePerson` LEFT JOIN department d ON d.`id` = s.`leadingDept` LEFT JOIN StoreHouseOutInDescRecord s2 ON s2.`outInRecordId`=s.`id` LEFT JOIN parttype p ON s2.`partTypeId` = p.`id` LEFT JOIN finishedproductstype f ON s2.`finishedProductId` = f.id LEFT JOIN department d2 ON d2.`id` = s.`releaseDept` LEFT JOIN admin a3 ON a3.`id` = s.`releasePerson`
and s.id=#{recordId}
